entities.name: dobby
entities.description: Dobby is a house-elf who finds work at Hogwarts and negotiates his salary with Professor Dumbledore.

entities.name: winky
entities.description: Winky is another house-elf who works with Dobby at Hogwarts.

entities.name: professor dumbledore
entities.description: Professor Dumbledore is the headmaster of Hogwarts who hires Dobby and Winky to work at the school.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is a student who overhears Dobby's conversation with Professor Dumbledore and expresses her opinion on his salary.

relationships.description: Dobby works for Professor Dumbledore at Hogwarts.
Dobby and Winky work together at Hogwarts.
Professor Dumbledore's conversation with Dobby is overheard by Hermione.
